name: ObservationAtHomeInVitroTestResultCovid
title: Observation - At-Home In-Vitro Test Result - COVID-19
description: This profile constrains the Observation - At-Home In-Vitro Test Result profile to COVID-19 At-Home In-Vitro Tests.

element.short: Consult LIVD: https://www.cdc.gov/csels/dls/livd-codes.html to obtain the values to be used for each particular use case.
The Specimen SHALL be from at-home COVID-19 sample.
element.definition: The referenced specimen should contain a Specimen.identifier and a Specimen.identifier.assigner

element.short: The referenced device is an at-home COVID-19 test device.
element.definition: The referenced device is an at-home COVID-19 test device, and should contain a Device.udiCarrier.deviceIdentifier. Please see GUDID data base: https://accessgudid.nlm.nih.gov/help/search/basic-search to find the device's UDI.
